ingredients.content: 400 g beef, cut in strips (1 cm)
250 g new potatoes, cut in pieces (2 cm)

preparations.content: Place oil and curry paste in mixing bowl then heat <b>2 min/100°C/speed <b>.
Add coconut cream then cook <b>3 min/100°C//speed <b>.
Add sugar, fish sauce and tamarind paste then cook <b>2 min/100°C//speed 0.5<b>.
Add coconut milk, potatoes, cinnamon stick and kaffir lime leaves then cook <b>20 min/98°C//speed 0.5<b>.
Serve hot garnished with chopped coriander - enjoy with rice to mop up the sauce.
